system.description:
You own an unusually powerful relic with a True Faith score of 3. The relic also has one power, which should be agreed upon with the storyguide (see Relics, page @@). As with the Minor General Virtue Relic, the item may be built into any other item that you possess, like a sword or a pendant. 

 

Owning such a powerful relic is a great responsibility, and your character should behave in an appropriate manner. If you ever behave impiously (as judged by the storyguide) your relic will cease to function until suitable penance is made.
